links: Chai Wah Wu, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..100
example: a(6)=65432117 is smallest prime beginning with the string 654321.
prog: (Python)from sympy import isprimedef A053547(n):....s = int(''.join(str(m) for m in range(n,0,-1)))....for i in range(1,10):........s *= 10........for j in range(1,10**i,2):............x = s+j............if isprime(x):................return x....else:........return 'search limit reached.' # _Chai Wah Wu_, Jan 02 2015
author: _Enoch Haga_, Jan 16 2000
